attributes.additional_details:
Catalonia wants their independence. They have the right to choose. 

[A quote from: http://www.huffingtonpost.co.uk/entry/11-things-to-know-about-catalonias-confusing-vote-on-independence_uk_59ce2593e4b05f005d339499]: They only want to do something as democratic as vote and decide for themselves. 

Now that the people have cast their vote, Parliament has said that the UK does not recognise Catalan declaration of independence. 
This is with out putting it to the people they represent!
attributes.background: I believe we, as a country with democracy, should recognise Catalonia's choice to declare independence. Their people have spoken their own wish. They have their right as human beings to cast their say. To not recognise them betrays all sense of democracy we claim we uphold.
